## insprctl cluster

Configure aspects of your insprd cluster

### Synopsis

Cluster takes a subcommand of (init)

```
insprctl cluster [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # init insprd as admin
 insprctl cluster init <admin_password>

```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for cluster
```
